channel.title: How to safe files in a specific place?
channel.description:
When i try safe file elsewhere than by default (TOR/download) i got error that i don't have permission to do that.
I would like to be able to save files where I like. How to do it? it is important for me. Please help me.

item.description:
• Tor Browser Essentials chapter Navigating Tor Browser Downloads in Whonix wiki
